Address.label: Address
Address.value: 18 ZHONGGUANGCUN STREET,ROOM 1618, ZHONGGUANGCUN MOOC TIMES BUILDING, BEIJING, 100190, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: China Liberal Education Holdings Ltd is an educational service provider operating in China. The company's operating segment includes Joint education programs; Textbook Sales; Overseas study consulting and Technological consulting for smart campus solutions. It generates maximum revenue from the Joint education programs segment. Geographically, it derives revenue from China. It also develops and provides textbooks and other course materials to students enrolled under the Sino-foreign Jointly Managed Academic Programs.
